QuestData.Title: Ill Omens
QuestData.Description: $n, in our battles with the Bleeding Hollow clan of fel orcs, we have found upon them foreboding trinkets. These orcs have collected the insignias of fallen Honor Hold soldiers and created cursed talismans from them. We fear the dark magic of the Bleeding Hollow orcs have transformed our insignias into evil charms with powers against us!$B$BFind such a talisman from the Bleeding Hollow orcs of Zeth'Gor, to the east, and bring it to Corporal Ironridge at Expedition Point, northeast of Zeth'Gor.
QuestData.LogDescription: Lieutenant Amadi in Honor Hold wants you to bring 1 Cursed Talisman to Corporal Ironridge at Expedition Point.
QuestData.CompletionText: Reporting from Honor Hold, $n? That's good -- our campaign against the demons and the fel orcs is running thin on able bodies!
QuestData.RewardText: Ah, you recovered an insignia from the Bleeding Hollow orcs? Good -- it is outrageous that they use our own symbols against us, and mock our comrades who've fallen to those red-skinned beasts!
